node.title: Israel rejects Biden's plan to reopen US consulate for Palestinians in Jerusalem
node.alt: Naftali Bennett sitting at a table in front of Israeli flags.
node.description: Israel's Prime Minister Naftali Bennett declares there is no room in Jerusalem for another US mission, suggesting it should be in the occupied West Bank.
node.content:
["Israel has stepped up its public opposition to the Biden\u00a0administration's plan to reopen a US\u00a0consulate for Palestinians in Jerusalem, suggesting such a mission should be in the occupied West Bank.", "Under former president Donald Trump, Washington delighted Israelis and outraged Palestinians by closing the Jerusalem consulate and placing its staff within the US embassy to Israel, which was moved to Jerusalem from Tel Aviv in 2018.", "Palestinians, who want East Jerusalem as the capital of a future state, saw the US\u00a0initiative to move its embassy as undermining that aspiration.", "Israel calls Jerusalem its indivisible capital.", "Seeking to repair ties with Palestinians, the Biden administration has said it will\u00a0reopen the consulate, although it has not given a date.", "", "
US\u00a0Secretary of State Antony Blinken met with Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas in Ramallah earlier this year.\u00a0(Pool via Reuters: Alex Brandon)
", "However, Israeli Prime Minister Naftali Bennett said late on Saturday there was no room in Jerusalem for another American mission.", "\"My position, and it was presented to the Americans \u2026 is that there is no place for a US\u00a0consulate which serves the Palestinians in Jerusalem,\" Mr Bennett said.\u00a0", "\"We are voicing our opinion consistently, quietly, without drama.\"", "Foreign Minister Yair Lapid, speaking next to Mr Bennett, proposed reopening the consulate in the de-facto seat of Palestinian government in Ramallah, in the occupied West Bank.", "\"If they [the US] want to open a consulate in Ramallah, we have no problem with that,\" he said.", "", "
The\u00a0US\u00a0consulate in East Jerusalem formally closed in 2019.\u00a0(Reuters:\u00a0Ronen Zvulun)
", "In Ramallah, the spokesman for Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas rejected Mr Lapid's comments.", "\"We will only accept a US\u00a0consulate in Jerusalem, the capital of the Palestinian state. That was what the US\u00a0administration had announced and had committed itself to doing,\" Nabil Abu Rudeineh said.", "Spokespeople for the US embassy did not immediately comment.", "US\u00a0Secretary of State Antony Blinken said last month Washington would \"be moving forward with the process of opening a consulate as part of deepening of those ties with the Palestinians\", although one of his senior staff also said Israel's rejection of the plan was an obstacle.", "\"My understanding [is]\u00a0that we need the consent of the host government to open any diplomatic facility,\" deputy secretary of state for management and resources Brian McKeon said during a US\u00a0Senate hearing when queried on the consulate stand-off.", "Reuters"]
